title: "STA2453H1Y - Data Science Methods, Collaboration, and Communication"

Welcome to the 2018/19 course website for STA2453- Data Science Methods, Collaboration, and Communication, [Department of Statistical Sciences, University of Toronto](http://utstat.toronto.edu).

This course can only be taken by graduate students in the Department of Statistical Sciences, and the MScAC Data Science concentration.
